property.name: fs.defaultFS
property.description: NameNode URI. This specifies the default file system used by Hadoop.

property.name: hadoop.tmp.dir
property.description: A base for other temporary directories. Must be configured to prevent data loss on reboot.

property.name: hadoop.proxyuser.hadoop.hosts
property.description: Allows 'hadoop' user to impersonate users from any host (or specific host). This is the host from which the proxy user is allowed to impersonate users.

property.name: hadoop.proxyuser.hadoop.groups
property.description: Allows 'hadoop' user to impersonate users belonging to any group (or specific groups). This is the group of the user which the proxy user is allowed to impersonate.
